#summary Session requests.

= Session requests =

Content:

  * [RequestsSession#Session_Start Session Start]
  * [RequestsSession#Session_Login Session Login]
  * [RequestsSession#Session_Logout Session Logout]
  * [RequestsSession#Session_Register Session Register]

----

== Session Start ==
|| request URL || `/session/start/` || 
|| description || Starts session. ||
|| method || GET ||

*Parameters*

None

*Returns*

1 `ApiSession` structure.

*`ApiSession`*
|| *field* || *type* || *description* ||
|| `photo_server` || `String` || URL of server with photos ||
|| `key` || `String` || API key ||
|| `id` || `String` || API key ||

----

== Session Login  ==
|| request URL || `/session/login/` || 
|| description || Logins user. ||
|| method || GET ||

*Prameters:*
|| *parameter* || *type* || *description* ||
|| `email` || `String` || User's email ||
|| `password` || `String` || User's password ||

*Returns:*
1 `User` structure.

*`User`*
|| *field* || *type* || *description* ||
|| `name` || `String` || User's first name ||
|| `surname` || `String` || User's last name ||
|| `gender` || `Character` || M for male, F for female ||

----

== Session Logout ==
|| request URL || `/session/logout/` ||
|| description || Logouts user. ||
|| method || GET ||

*Prameters:*

None

*Returns:*
